main.name: Ingþór Birkir Árnason
main.bio: I love exploring and experiencing something new. I have a great interest in football, outdoor activities and sports. I have great communications skills and am well organized. Always looking to learn something new and overcome challenges. Ps. Animation up top is connected to a Weather API in Bern that shows current weather.

education.description: Main focus on Web Development and UI design. Learned the important aspect to work independently.
AWS Cloud concepts, AWS services, security, architecture and pricing.

work.title: Data, Analytics & AI Engineer
work.description: Creating and maintaining web applications that are used as a Self Service Data Platform. Creating value from data and enabling all to make us of it. Working both on the front end and backend as a web developer to transform Swisscom into a data-informed company. Took over as my teams Security Champion to ensure that we are following all security best practices. Taking integral part of our Data Management journey.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Working as external contractor for the Swiss government. Mainly working on web application as a fullstack developer. Creating Unit tests, Integration tests and Regression tests for the project. Working with Cloud Foundry, JIRA and Jenkins.  Creating Jenkinsfiles for customised projects, detailed documentation for projects. Working with Kafka events, sending and receiving messages.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Working remotely as a technical consultant for Risk Management Solutions. Working in integration solutions and platforms mostly in the backend. Reduced the time required to import data into the platform by a significant factor by creating a app through Windows Forms and C#. Implementing an integration solution for costumer to use platform through API, built using .Net, C# and Microsoft Azure and SQL databases. Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment through Microsoft Azure pipelines for delivering product with a push of a button.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Front end developer in an young startup company in Reykjavik. Got great experience from working in agile and fast-paced startup environment. I implemented many new features on the website and had an active role in decision making process. Hands on experience with React and Redux and AWS and Git. Wrote some articles about Iceland as well.

projects.title: Travelade
projects.category: Travel guids by locals in the know. Helps people find recommendations and local insights from all across the world.
